bill.summary: 6/17/1994--Introduced. National Children's Island Act of 1994 - Authorizes the Mayor of the District of Columbia to: (1) lease certain property located in, and transferred to the administrative jurisdiction of, the District by the Secretary of the Interior, for an initial term not to exceed 35 years and an additional renewal term not to exceed 30 years; and (2) allow construction of improvements of such property after completion of all required environmental studies and reports.
